General.Name: Vina San Pedro
General.Description: Viña San Pedro Tarapacá S.A. produces and exports wines in Chile and internationally. It markets its products under the Altair, Cabo de Hornos, Sideral, Kankana del Elqui, and Tierras Moradas brand names. The company was founded in 1865 and is based in Santiago, Chile. Viña San Pedro Tarapacá S.A. operates as a subsidiary of CCU Inversiones S.A.
General.Address: Avenida Vitacura #2670, Santiago de Chile, Chile
